title: Allaikha
text:
The Allaikha () is a <a href="river">river</a> of <a href="Sakha%20Republic">Sakha Republic</a>, <a href="Russia">Russia</a>, a left hand tributary of the <a href="Indigirka">Indigirka</a>. It is long, and has a drainage basin of .
Course.
The Allaikha has its source in the northern slopes of the <a href="Polousny%20Range">Polousny Range</a> at the Swan Lake, in the confluence of two small rivers, Fena (Фена) and Elikcheen (Эликчээн). It flows meandering roughly northeastwards across the <a href="Yana-Indigirka%20Lowland">Yana-Indigirka Lowland</a>. It finally joins the Indigirka about north of <a href="Chokurdakh">Chokurdakh</a>. 
There are more than four thousand lakes in the basin of the Allaikha. Its most important tributary is the Ot-Yuryakh from the left.
